typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class as string,
		Risk_Opp_Class as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as short,
		Severity as short,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as short,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as short,
		Residual_Severity as short,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as short,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceUpdate
SourceUpdate select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Opp_Class,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(Risk_Opp_ID)))) ~> AlterRowUpdate
AlterRowUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Risk_Opp_ID'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Opp_Class,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton,
		Actions_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
